ack.p: This research was possible thanks to the technical support of the Laboratorio de Análisis de Información Geográfica y Estadística at ECOSUR. The Instituto Nacional de Estadística y Geografía (INEGI) and Intermap Technologies provided the digital data used in this study. The Department of Geographical Sciences at the University of Maryland, Pronatura, and the Centro de Investigación Científica de Yucatán (CICY) provided technical consultancies, reviews, and office space during part of the development of this research. Finally, the authors thank the anonymous reviewers for their valuable insights and comments.
